about_the_game:
An arcade game based on shooting three types of enemies.
The story is about a gang of aliens from another galaxy that were put to community service, so they will clean the universe from what they think is the worst garbage: humans! Since is just arcade, the story is not that important but we are planning on use the same characters in our next releases!
You have three hearts in the beginning of every play, and after some kills you can obtain some hearts from the enemies. You have an unlimited amount of time and you have to get the highest score possible before losing all your hearts.
There are nine characters (one of them is locked, so you need to unlock them!) in total, everyone has a different and unique skill that you can use to kill enemies in a easier way!
detailed_description:
Anime Reference

Can you find all the references in the game? talk in the Steam community department !!


About the Game

An arcade game based on shooting three types of enemies. The story is about a gang of aliens from another galaxy that were put to community service, so they will clean the universe from what they think is the worst garbage: humans! Since is just arcade, the story is not that important but we are planning on use the same characters in our next releases! You have three hearts in the beginning of every play, and after some kills you can obtain some hearts from the enemies. You have an unlimited amount of time and you have to get the highest score possible before losing all your hearts. There are nine characters (one of them is locked, so you need to unlock them!) in total, everyone has a different and unique skill that you can use to kill enemies in a easier way!

name: Humans Are Useless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: processore Intel® Core™ i3-11500HE (12 MB di cache, fino a 4,50 GHz)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD A10-9620P RADEON R5
  • Storage: 109 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: processore Intel® Core™ i5-11500HE (12 MB di cache, fino a 4,50 GHz)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD A10-9620P RADEON R5
  • Storage: 109 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek

short_description: A gang of nine aliens from another galaxy that were put to community service, want to clean the universe from what they think is the worst garbage: humans! Help them in this arcade game!
